description.p1: I am a dedicated Full Stack Web Developer who prioritizes collaboration within the team and is passionate about serving the needs of our clients.
description.p2: Currently, I am actively learning and honing my skills in high-demand languages like Javascript, and its associated stack, including MongoDB, ExpressJs, ReactJs, NodeJs, and Ruby on Rails.

list_1.title: Technical Skills
list_1.p1: Proficiency in JavaScript (React, NextJS, Node.js, Express).
list_1.p2: Strong front-end development skills with HTML, CSS, and responsive designing.
list_1.p3: Backend development expertise with Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and Ruby on Rails.
list_1.p4: Experience in designing and implementing RESTful APIs.

list_2.title: Projects Experience
list_2.p1: Designing and implementing RESTful APIs for seamless communication between frontend and backend.
list_2.p2: Integration of third-party services to enhance application functionality.
list_2.p3: Creation of responsive and user-friendly front-end interfaces using React, NextJS, MUI, Bootstrap and jQuery.
list_2.p4: Database management using PostgreSQL, MySql and MongoDB.

list_3.title: Agile Development
list_3.p1: Familiarity and experience with Agile development methodologies.
list_3.p2: Thriving in fast-paced environments and meeting tight deadlines.
list_3.p3: Effective prioritization and delivery of features within project timelines.

list_4.title: Communication and Teamwork
list_4.p2: A team-oriented mindset, emphasizing collaboration and shared success.
list_4.p3: Passionate about working with diverse teams to deliver high-quality products.

list_5.title: Adaptability and Continuous Learning
list_5.p1: A passion for learning new technologies.
list_5.p2: Adaptability to evolving industry trends and tools.

description.p3: With such a strong background, I can bring a valuable mix of technical expertise, and a collaborative approach to work. My commitment to continuous learning and ability to thrive in fast-paced environments make to me a promising candidate for contributing to and enhancing any development team.
